tour_name: Japan & South Korea: Ancient Traditions & Modern Marvels

sections.title: Tokyo: Neon Lights and Imperial Grandeur
sections.content: Immerse yourself in the vibrant energy of Tokyo. Explore the neon-lit streets, visit the serene Imperial Palace, a symbol of Japan's imperial history, and participate in a hands-on sushi-making class, learning the art of preparing this iconic Japanese dish.  Enjoy the comfort and convenience of the 4-star Tokyo Dome Hotel, ideally located in the heart of the city.

sections.title: Mt. Fuji and Hakone: Natural Beauty and Relaxation
sections.content: Journey to the majestic Mt. Fuji, capturing breathtaking panoramic views of this iconic volcano.  Spend relaxing days in Hakone, a mountain resort town famed for its natural hot springs and stunning scenery. Enjoy scenic cruises on Lake Ashi, surrounded by breathtaking landscapes.

sections.title: Kyoto: Ancient Temples and Geisha Culture
sections.content: Explore the ancient capital of Kyoto, rich in history and tradition. Discover its serene temples and exquisite gardens, including the iconic thousands of red torii gates at Fushimi Inari Shrine. Indulge in a refined Kaiseki dinner, a multi-course Japanese haute cuisine experience, accompanied by the elegant performance of a geisha.

sections.title: Osaka and Hiroshima: Culinary Delights and Reflection
sections.content: Experience the vibrant culinary scene of Osaka, known for its diverse and delicious street food.  Then, travel to Hiroshima and visit the poignant Peace Memorial Park, a site dedicated to peace and remembrance. Stay at premium hotels like the Hotel Granvia Hiroshima, ensuring a comfortable and luxurious experience.

sections.title: Seoul: Palaces, Street Food, and the DMZ
sections.content: Arrive in Seoul, South Korea's dynamic capital. Explore the magnificent Gyeongbokgung Palace, a stunning example of Korean architecture. Immerse yourself in the bustling atmosphere of Myeongdong, sampling delicious street food.  Visit the Demilitarized Zone (DMZ), a historically significant site, and experience the stark contrast between North and South Korea.  Stay in the luxurious 5-star Lotte Hotel Seoul.

sections.title: Busan and Gyeongju: Coastline Charm and Ancient History
sections.content: Journey to Busan, a coastal city known for its vibrant beaches and fresh seafood.  Then, explore Gyeongju, a historic city brimming with ancient sites.  Enjoy a unique temple stay experience at Golgulsa Temple, immersing yourself in Korean Buddhist culture.

sections.title: Jeju Island: Farewell to Paradise
sections.content: Conclude your journey on the stunning Jeju Island, renowned for its breathtaking natural beauty and romantic landscapes.  Enjoy a final farewell dinner at a high-end Korean BBQ restaurant, savoring the delicious flavors of Korea one last time.
